about_the_game:
English Title: Reminiscence in the Rain
This is a downloadable version of the ADV "Reminiscence in the Rain" (ハルジオンは雨と咲く) released on December 31st, 2023.

Story


The world's most "sentimental" tale.

"Let's go away together."
Those were Yuika Aoi's last words.
It was the winter of my first year of college. She disappeared, without a trace.
Two years later, I received a phone call.

"Yuika Aoi has been found."

Time began to move again after its long frozen silence.
Aoi's past started to be revealed, along with the myth "the town of mermaids."
The true meaning of "memory" swirls in the midst of traditions and incidents.
Where had she gone? - only the flower knows.

Product Information


  • Genre: Visual Novel
  • Play time: 6-8 hours

Producer Information


  • Planning: "Tsuisou" (縋想) Project
  • Scenario/Direction: Gainen Sanagi (佐薙概念)
  • System/Music: Ao Takeuma (竹馬あお)
  • Character Design/Illustration/Backgrounds: Itsuki Inubouzaki (犬吠埼いつき)

content_descriptors.notes: This game may contain mature content that is not appropriate for all ages and in the workplace, including revealing clothing, sexual content, indirect descriptions of accidental death and suicide.

Time began to move again after its long frozen silence.
Aoi's past started to be revealed, along with the myth "the town of mermaids."

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 10.10+
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz 64-bit Intel-compatible (Apple silicon supported through Rosetta 2)
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 3.0
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

movies.name: ハルジオンは雨と咲く -- Reminiscence in the Rain -- 2nd PV「薄命光線」

name: Reminiscence in the Rain

subs.option_text: ハルジオンは雨と咲く - $8.99 USD

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 or newer
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz 64-bit Intel-compatible
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 3.0 or DirectX 11
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
